record.title: UNANIMOUS-CONSENT AGREEMENT--S. 3268

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that after the Senate convenes on Tuesday, July 22, the hour prior to the cloture vote on the motion to proceed to S. 3268 be equally divided and controlled between the leaders or their designees; that upon the use or yielding back of that time, the Senate proceed to vote on the motion to invoke cloture; further, that the mandatory quorum be waived.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
